Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
03.10.2014 SH SCR19191 Added GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS(2109) to check if the expiry date is not too far in the future
23.06.2013 GB SCR18228 ODC001BUPD/6 Extended condition for AUTH selection (AUTH_AMOUNT >= ...)
08.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
15.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CLHS)
28.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.12.2011 SH SCR16934 ODC001BUPD Step6 Added test on HUSR_ID <> user(0)
06.07.2011 SH SCR16578 ODC001BUPD: Changed selection on AUTH in step 6
according to GSBU_YESNO(1277)
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
04.05.2011 SH SCR16426 Changed Heller in Admin currency and repl.GB002 by GB902
28.12.2010 GB SCR16098 Extended AUTH selection in the 6. Offer the request ...
13.10.2010 SH SCR15839 Extended UHRC check with entered limit > 0
18.08.2010 GB SCR15743 Changed update fields CLCR_CLIENTREQ, CLCR_INTERNALREQ
21.07.2010 SH SCR15648 Added UHRC check
15.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
12.04.2010 GB SCR15447 Extended condition for button OK
18.09.2009 SH SCR14911 Renambed program ID ODC001BNL in ODC001B
09.07.2009 GB SCR14721 Added update CLHS_CLIENTUPDATED
27.11.2008 SH SCR14163 Added test on entered limit is > 0 for test "Limit
already exits at debtor: ...."
28.08.2008 SH SCR13911 Changed layout into 1025*768 and extended button OK
handling with tests on V.EXPIRYDATE = DEBC_FINANCELIMITEXPIRY
18.07.2008 SH SCR13799 ODC001BUPD Part 6: Extended tests on
AUTHORIZATIONS (if V.FINANCELIMITH =< PO.ALLOWEDLIMIT)
25.06.2008 SH SCR13735 ODC001BUPD Part 6: Removed test on 10% to inform
the teamleader via MQ198
19.05.2008 SH SCR13616 Added button Payment history
14.04.2008 SH SCR13544 Extended finance code A handling for decreased limits
11.03.2008 SH SCR13462 Added BDC128NL.PO.MAXUSERLIMIT (not used in this program)
28.02.2008 SH SCR13436 Changed test to display button OK/enable modificatons if
the details are from CREDIT_LIMIT_HISTORY (if CLHS_WAITFORAPPROVAL = Y not
27.11.2007 SH SCR13158 Step6 Extended department role handling for teamleader
22.11.2007 SH SCR13158 Added BDC126.PI.CLHS_TEXT = entered text
Pushbutton handling
-- AUTH_TYPE = 12 if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = N
-- AUTH_TYPE = 13 if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y
Pushbutton handling
-- Button Delete
-- Button OK
-- Check CLHS to enabe button History
-- Fetch variables from CLHS / DEBC for initializations
-- Values from CLHS
... uses for button Delete handling
... uses for button OK handling and modify mode
-- Values from DEBC
... uses for button OK handling and modify mode
-- Other variables
... init with CLNT108_ACC_CURR if still blank
... does not use Blob control for input of CLSH_TEXT, because of problems with
storing control chars to BOLB if text is added with copy/paste (max. 20.000)
... ask users where list of payment history has to be copied to the text field
... append list
... overwrite current contents
... add CR/LF so users can add immed new text below the copied list

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,7}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,8}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Negative limit not allowed
-- Invalid currency
-- Expiry date is mandatory if V.FINANCELIMIT > 0
-- Days until expiry cannot be >= defined days for client business unit
-- Expiry date cannot be in the past
-- Variable text is mandatory
-- 0 Limit on affiliate not allowed
-- No limits allowed on UHRC countries
-- Additional validations
-- Check if entered limit already exists at another debtor
-- Test if enterd finance limit is allowed (only if value > 0)
... delete MQ198 rows of current debtor client
@All validations are performed outsite the current transaction, see task
'Validations'
... in case of entered limit <> null / 0
99. Messages for the users
... Limit decreased --> second approval is not required
... Finance code = A --> second approval is not required
... 2 other approvals are required
... 1 other approval are required
-- 4. Calculate finance limit competence
... if v.FINANCELIMITH = 0 then not further database updates are required
-- 5. Store limit decision history
... delay to avoid LDHI duplicates (see LDHI_TIME)
6. Offer the request in MQ 198 for approval
99. Messages for the users
... messages are presented outside the current transaction, see parenrt task
-- Prepare department role which used in the further steps
-- Offer the request to the authorized users
